text: Auritidibacter is a Gram-positive, aerobic, non-spore-forming and rod-shaped genus of bacteria from the family of Micrococcaceae with one known species (Auritidibacter ignavus). Auritidibacter ignavus has been isolated from an ear swab from Bad Orb in Germany. ==References== Category:Actinobacteria Category:Bacteria genera Category:Monotypic bacteria genera
title: Auritidibacter
